message:
### Error querying database.  Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'userId' in 'field list'
### The error may exist in kr/hs/dgsw/board_back/Domain/PostMapper.java (best guess)
### The error may involve defaultParameterMap
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: select id, userId, title, content, created, updated from post
### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'userId' in 'field list'
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'userId' in 'field list'
